thread.title: Man United target Youri Tielemans told to join Arsenal by ex-Tottenham striker | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United target Youri Tielemans told to join Arsenal by ex-Tottenham striker | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United target Youri Tielemans told to join Arsenal by ex-Tottenham striker | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 5:05 pm Youri Tielemans has attracted attention from a host of European clubs (Picture: Getty) 
Former Tottenham striker Nico Claesen has urged Manchester United target Youri Tielemans to join Arsenal . 
Tielemans, 19, is rated as one of the brightest prospect in Europe and has made over 100 appearances for Anderlecht since 2013. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The midfielder, whose performances in the Belgian First Division led to an international call-up last year, has been tracked by a host of Premier League clubs. 
Jose Mourinho was reportedly in contact with the wonderkid last summer regarding a switch to Old Trafford, while Chelsea and Tottenham have also been liked with a move. 
But Claesen, who spent two years at Spurs in the 1980s, believes Arsenal would be an ideal club for Tielemans. 
‘Succeeding in the Premier League is something different to excelling in Belgium,’ Claesen, 54, told Het Laatste Nieuws. 
‘I think of efficiency in the adaptation, because he needs to work on. Arsenal fixtures 
Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Lincoln – FA Cup (H) – 11/12 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Crystal Palace (A) – Sat 8 Apr 
‘And can he compete? At Anderlecht, everything has always been relatively easy for him. In England he must start from scratch and learn to fight.
